name: LinkedIn Data Export
desc: Created a Chrome Extension that automates LinkedIn job applications, captures applicant details, and enables easy export to Excel/CSV.

name: Fashion Website Scraper
desc: Developed a Django scraper for extracting images, prices, and descriptions from fashion websites.

name: HubSpot Forms Exporter
desc: Developed an extension that converts HubSpot form submissions to PDFs with customizable exports.

name: Spotify Player Clone
desc: Spotify clone using React and Tailwind CSS for music streaming.

name: JavaScript Projects Website
desc: This website is specially build to showcase all major javaScript projects. All my javaScript based projects are in it.

name: SiteToSheet
desc: SiteToSheet is a Python Flask app that fetches indexed URLs from a website using the Google Custom Search API and saves them to Google Sheets securely.

name: Firebase Contact App
desc: Contact management app using React, Firebase, and Tailwind CSS with real-time contact addition, viewing, editing, and deletion.

name: Myntra Website Clone
desc: This project clones the Myntra website to replicate its interface and functionality for learning purposes.

name: Dice Game
desc: A simple React dice game where you select a number, roll a dice, and earn or lose points based on whether your selected number matches the dice roll.

name: Gas Utility Services
desc: The Gas Utility Services Web Application lets users submit complaints, track their status, and pay charges through generated invoices, requiring registration or login for access.

name: PDF Password Cracker
desc: A Python script to unlock password-protected PDF files, enabling access to encrypted documents.

name: Keyword Internal Linking
desc: Developed Python script utilizing Google Custom Search Engine API to perform keyword searches on specified domain, fetching URLs and updating Google Sheets with results.

name: QR Code Generator
desc: This Python script generates QR codes for a given URL using the qrcode library for QR code generation.

name: URL Shortner
desc: This Python script shortens a long URL using the pyshorteners library.

name: WhatsApp Message Scheduler
desc: This Python script allows you to schedule WhatsApp messages to be sent at a specific time using the pywhatkit library.

name: User Authentication
desc: This project is a Django application focused on user authentication, providing secure registration, login, logout, and password reset functionality.

name: Employee Management
desc: The Employee Management System is a Django-based web application that streamlines employee information management, including details, attendance, leaves, and more.

name: Agent Campaign API
desc: AgentCampaignAPI is a Django REST API for managing agents and campaigns, supporting CRUD operations, pagination, and tracking of outcomes, costs, and call details.

name: Weather Application
desc: The Django Weather Application is a web tool that offers real-time weather conditions and forecasts for global locations, built with Django and integrated with a weather API.

name: Digital Clock
desc: This Python script creates a simple digital clock using the tkinter library.

name: Expense Tracker
desc: This Python app tracks expenses, allowing users to add, edit, delete, and view expenses in words, using SQLite3 for the database and tkinter for the GUI.

name: Internet Speed Meter
desc: A simple Tkinter GUI application to check internet speed using the speedtest module.

name: Screen and Webcam Recorder
desc: This Python script records your screen along with the webcam feed and saves it as a video file using OpenCV, NumPy, and PyAutoGUI.
